parts.name: description
parts.prose: Planning, implementation, maintenance and continuous improvement of a framework regarding information security within the organization.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Establish an ISMS aligned with ISO/IEC 27001, integrate risk management and define governance structures.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Providing policies and instructions with respect to the security claim and to support the business requirements.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Document policies uniformly, version and approve them by top management, and communicate to all stakeholders.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Ensure that employees, service providers and suppliers understand their tasks, are aware of their responsibilities regarding information security, and that assets are protected when tasks change or end.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Provide role‑based screening, training and clear assignment of duties; enforce confidentiality agreements.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Identifying the organization's own assets and responsible persons as well as ensuring an appropriate level of protection.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Maintain an accurate register of hardware, software, data and assign clear ownership and classification.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Preventing unauthorized physical access and protection against theft, damage, loss and operational failures.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Implement perimeters, entry controls, CCTV and environmental safeguards.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Assuring proper regular operations including capacity planning, malware protection, logging and monitoring events, as well as handling vulnerabilities, malfunctions and errors.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Define standard operating procedures, implement patching and monitor system health continuously.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Securing the authorization and authentication of cloud provider and customer users to prevent unauthorized access.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Enforce strong MFA, least‑privilege role assignments and periodic access reviews.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Using appropriate and effective cryptography to safeguard information security.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Select algorithms per current standards, manage keys securely and rotate regularly.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Protecting information in networks and the corresponding information-processing systems.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Use TLS/SSL, VPNs and network segmentation to secure data in transit.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Providing the ability to securely operate the service on different IT platforms and to terminate the service securely.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Support open APIs and data export formats; ensure secure decommissioning.

groups.title: Procurement, Development and Maintenance of Information Systems

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Complying with security objectives during new developments and procurement of information systems as well as changes.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Integrate security requirements in procurement contracts; follow secure coding and change control.

groups.title: Control and Monitoring of Service Providers and Suppliers

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Protecting information accessed by subcontractors and monitoring agreed service and security requirements.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Define inclusive or carve‑out audit methods; include subcontractor controls in system description.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Assuring a consistent and comprehensive approach to monitoring, recording, assessment, communication and escalation of security incidents.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Establish CERT, define roles, prioritization and incident classification schemes.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Strategic establishment and governance of BCM; planning, implementing and testing continuity concepts to ensure continuous operations.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Conduct regular disaster recovery tests and integrate with incident response.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Checking and verifying that information security safeguards are implemented and carried out in accordance with organization‑wide policies and instructions.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Perform independent audits (ISAE 3402, IDW PS 951) and follow up findings promptly.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Preventing violations of statutory or contractual duties with respect to information security.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Map controls to BSI IT‑Grundschutz and GDPR requirements; document evidence.

parts.name: description
parts.prose: Guaranteeing secure access to IT systems via mobile devices under the cloud provider’s responsibility.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Enforce device encryption, MDM solutions and secure configuration profiles.
